title: Password encryption based on a certificate
author: FrancescoBonizzi
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->

In our company we have all logins stored in a SQL storage. We coded a little application to generate an mRemotNG XML configuration based on our data. The idea is to generate that configuration once and distribute such file over our company. 

We don't understand how to encrypt correctly each remote desktop login password to make you application read it correctly. Do you have any suggestions? Maybe is there the possibility to encrypt / decrypt such passwords with a c...
